mapper.select: select * from cart where user_id=#{user_id} order by cart_date desc limit 1
mapper.insert: insert into cart(product_num, product_name, product_thumbnail, product_price, product_sale, product_color, product_size, product_count, user_id) values(#{product_num}, #{product_name}, #{product_thumbnail}, #{product_price}, #{product_sale}, #{product_color}, #{product_size}, #{product_count}, #{user_id})
mapper.update: update cart set product_count=#{product_count} where user_id=#{user_id} and product_num=#{product_num} and product_color=#{product_color} and product_size=#{product_size}
mapper.delete: delete from cart where product_num=#{product_num} and product_color=#{product_color} and product_size=#{product_size}
mapper.select: select count(*) from cart where user_id=#{user_id} and product_num=#{product_num} and product_color=#{product_color} and product_size=#{product_size} and user_id=#{user_id}
